title: 游戏崩溃了，不知哪里出错，求大神指点
author: 豆丁宝宝龙
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 14-10-21 下午10:15
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.Error: IP Helper Library le function failed

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 网卡驱动？！？IP Helper是mod么？还是插件？

replies.author: liach
replies.txt_content: 恭喜中奖！fml出错！用最新的再试一下！

replies.author: 豆丁宝宝龙
replies.txt_content: 问题已经解决了，将MinecraftLoader删除后恢复正常了，谢谢各位的热心帮助。
